attributes.action: Offer a "Carbon Offsetting Alternative" which funds Carbon Reducing Research Projects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rather than simply paying someone to plant trees everytime you fly, a voultary contribution to a research fund could be made.

Money from this fund would be used to fund research projects into better sources of fuels, or other means of reducing carbon emissions, such as composite materials for building cars, planes etc.

Rather than simply paying money to clear your concience this could provide real solutions to our current predicament and aid British Universities and Industry.
